fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to accept, reject, or hold gift requests.
- After participating in a secured node, during the day, select 2 gift requests in inventory. If they are from NTF, automatically accept them, otherwise, automatically reject them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your existence is public.
- During the day, people may anonymously submit gift requests, which are upgrades to their role that they would like to receive. They must provide an accurate description, but it may be vague and the host will make sure what it does is understood.
- Accepting a request gives them the upgrade. Rejecting it removes the gift from your list. Holding it allows you to review it tomorrow.
